changeinfo.changes:
Welcome to Rock Band 4! Thanks for playing, we've got some notes on our most recent update:
RB 2021 Patch Notes: - Added Rock Shop assets for future Rivals Seasons - Added new free t-shirts in the Rock Shop - Added new Placement and Tier Badges for future Rivals Seasons - Added new background menu music - Updated loading screen help tips - Fixed a text bug in the Zess's Humble Style Hair description
